Description.Title: EC.JRC.MARS.Crop.CropML.PartitioningAndLAI.SLAbasedLeafAreaExpansion
Description.Abstract: Specific leaf area-based leaf area expansion - Van Keulen, H., Wolf, J., 1986. Modelling of agricultural production: weather soils and crops. Simulation Monographs. Pudoc, Wageningen, The Netherlands, pp. 479. -

Input.name: TotalLeafAreaIndexFromSLA
Input.description: Total leaf area index from specific leaf area

Input.name: GreenLeafAreaIndexFromSLA
Input.description: Green leaf area index from specific leaf area

Input.name: SpecificLeafAreaFunctionOfDVS_SLATB
Input.description: Specific leaf area as a function of DVS (SLATB)

Output.name: TotalLeafAreaIndexFromSLARate
Output.description: Total leaf area index from specific leaf area rate

Output.name: GreenLeafAreaIndexFromSLARate
Output.description: Green leaf area index from specific leaf area rate

Output.name: GreenLeafAreaIndexFromSLA
Output.description: Green leaf area index from specific leaf area

Output.name: TotalLeafAreaIndexFromSLA
Output.description: Total leaf area index from specific leaf area
